name: 邱彥凱
objective:
應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
Students will learn to sketch by hand with various tools and technologies on design drawings. Simple painting tips such as spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion, as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation, will be taught in this class.
schedule:
1. 基本透視原理教學
2. 產品實物練習
scorePolicy:
1. 出席率
2. 作業繳交狀況
3. 最終作品集
